context: Hello! I'm looking for a scary movie. Hostel (2011) is one of my favorites.
resp: Obviously, Saw (2004) but I'm sure you've seen that. I liked the recent movie, The Boy (2016) Hush (2016) was good as was The Eyes of My Mother (2016)
